name: Mermaid Princess Spa & Salon - mermaid girl makeover
name_original: Mermaid Princess Spa & Salon - mermaid girl makeover
description:
"Mermaid Makeup Salon is a special girls makeup game with theme of Mermaid.
You are able to spa her, make up with all kinds of tools, dress her up with a variety of fashionable clothes and accessories! Find magic mermaid and makeup for them! Discover a world of underwater fun with the magical mermaid princesses!

These beautiful princesses have been struck by an AMAZING mermaid spell! Swim your heart out and explore a magnificent underwater city! Help the mermaids clean up oil spills and make a watery fish castle! Make bubbly music with the mermaid band, explore shipwrecks (maybe you’ll find a treasure!) enjoy fun mazes and design stylish mermaid jewelry."
